NOSTAJİ SEVENLER SEVECEKTİR BU OYUNU HERKESE TAVSİYE EDERİM

Is this game still enjoyable in 2020/2021?

bhop servers, surf servers, deathmatch servers, bomb defusal servers with custom maps... this game is still a lot of fun!

Due to the more arcady gameplay it feels better than cs:go in my opinion. Snipers don't sway, there's no super complicated spray pattern you have to learn for each gun and the gameplay is much faster. (and there are no screaming russian kids and cheaters)

I also love the old weapon sounds and the variety of modded maps and modes.

If you like counter strike or any old school shooters (like crossfire for example) you should really buy this game, even in 2020/2021!

And yes, people still play this. There are currently between 3-6k people playing it every single day (:
